queries.query: #if("$!{selected_type}" == "BOX") SELECT TO_CHAR(IF_DTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') CNFM_DATE, ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',MS_QTY,0))/1000,0) "면스낵 금년재고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',MS_QTY,0))/1000,0) "면스낵 전년재고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',MS_CHGO,0))/1000,0) "면스낵 금년출고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',MS_CHGO,0))/1000,0) "면스낵 전년출고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',DO_QTY,0))/1000,0) "매입상품 금년재고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',DO_QTY,0))/1000,0) "매입상품 전년재고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',DO_CHGO,0))/1000,0) "매입상품 금년출고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',DO_CHGO,0))/1000,0) "매입상품 전년출고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',EX_QTY,0))/1000,0) "수입상품 금년재고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',EX_QTY,0))/1000,0) "수입상품 전년재고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',EX_CHGO,0))/1000,0) "수입상품 금년출고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',EX_CHGO,0))/1000,0) "수입상품 전년출고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',GITA_QTY,0))/1000,0) - ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',MS_QTY,0))/1000,0) - ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',DO_QTY,0))/1000,0) - ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',EX_QTY,0))/1000,0) "기타 금년재고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',GITA_QTY,0))/1000,0) - ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',MS_QTY,0))/1000,0) - ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',DO_QTY,0))/1000,0) - ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',EX_QTY,0))/1000,0) "기타 전년재고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',GITA_CHGO,0))/1000,0) - ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',MS_CHGO,0))/1000,0) - ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',DO_CHGO,0))/1000,0) - ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',EX_CHGO,0))/1000,0) "기타 금년출고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',GITA_CHGO,0))/1000,0) - ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',MS_CHGO,0))/1000,0) - ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',DO_CHGO,0))/1000,0) - ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',EX_CHGO,0))/1000,0) "기타 전년출고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',GITA_QTY,0))/1000,0) "계 금년재고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',GITA_QTY,0))/1000,0) "계 전년재고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',GITA_CHGO,0))/1000,0) "계 금년출고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',GITA_CHGO,0))/1000,0) "계 전년출고" FROM ( /*금년재고*/ SELECT IF_DTTM, '1' GUBN, SUM(QTY) MS_QTY, 0 MS_CHGO, 0 DO_QTY, 0 DO_CHGO, 0 EX_QTY, 0 EX_CHGO, 0 GITA_QTY, 0 GITA_CHGO FROM ( SELECT S1.IF_DTTM, SUM(S1.QTY) QTY FROM WMS_STOCK S1, ITEM_MST S2, DC_MST S3, CMITEM S4, ( SELECT CAL_DATE FROM CAL_MST WHERE CAL_DATE BETWEEN '$!{start_date}' AND '$!{end_date}' )S5 WHERE S1.IF_DTTM = S5.CAL_DATE AND S1.ITEM_ID = S2.ITEM_ID AND S1.ITEM_ID = S4.ITEM_CD AND S3.DC_ID = S1.LOC_ID AND S2.ITYPE = 'FERT' AND S2.DIVISION IN ('10','20') AND S3.DC_ID != '8922' AND NVL(S2.CAT03,'XX') NOT LIKE 'O%' -- 수출품목 제외 AND S3.EXPORT_FLAG IS NULL -- 부두, CY 제외 GROUP BY S1.IF_DTTM ) GROUP BY IF_DTTM UNION ALL SELECT IF_DTTM, '1' GUBN, 0 MS_QTY, 0 MS_CHGO, SUM(QTY) DO_QTY, 0 DO_CHGO, 0 EX_QTY, 0 EX_CHGO, 0 GITA_QTY, 0 GITA_CHGO FROM ( SELECT S1.IF_DTTM, SUM(S1.QTY) QTY FROM WMS_STOCK S1, ITEM_MST S2, DC_MST S3, CMITEM S4, ( SELECT CAL_DATE FROM CAL_MST WHERE CAL_DATE BETWEEN '$!{start_date}' AND '$!{end_date}' )S5 WHERE S1.IF_DTTM = S5.CAL_DATE AND S1.ITEM_ID = S2.ITEM_ID AND S1.ITEM_ID = S4.ITEM_CD AND S3.DC_ID = S1.LOC_ID AND S2.ITYPE = 'HAWA' AND S2.RC_FLAG = 'Y' AND S3.DC_ID != '8922' AND NVL(S2.CAT03,'XX') NOT LIKE 'O%' -- 수출품목 제외 AND S3.EXPORT_FLAG IS NULL -- 부두, CY 제외 GROUP BY S1.IF_DTTM ) GROUP BY IF_DTTM UNION ALL SELECT IF_DTTM, '1' GUBN, 0 MS_QTY, 0 MS_CHGO, 0 DO_QTY, 0 DO_CHGO, SUM(QTY) EX_QTY, 0 EX_CHGO, 0 GITA_QTY, 0 GITA_CHGO FROM ( SELECT S1.IF_DTTM, SUM(S1.QTY) QTY FROM WMS_STOCK S1, ITEM_MST S2, DC_MST S3, CMITEM S4, ( SELECT CAL_DATE FROM CAL_MST WHERE CAL_DATE BETWEEN '$!{start_date}' AND '$!{end_date}' )S5 WHERE S1.IF_DTTM = S5.CAL_DATE AND S1.ITEM_ID = S2.ITEM_ID AND S1.ITEM_ID = S4.ITEM_CD AND S3.DC_ID = S1.LOC_ID AND S2.ITYPE = 'HAWA' AND S2.ST_FLAG = 'Y' AND S3.DC_ID != '8922' AND NVL(S2.CAT03,'XX') NOT LIKE 'O%' -- 수출품목 제외 AND S3.EXPORT_FLAG IS NULL -- 부두, CY 제외 GROUP BY S1.IF_DTTM ) GROUP BY IF_DTTM UNION ALL SELECT IF_DTTM, '1' GUBN, 0 MS_QTY, 0 MS_CHGO, 0 DO_QTY, 0 DO_CHGO, 0 EX_QTY, 0 EX_CHGO, SUM(QTY) '$!{end_date}' )S5 WHERE S1.IF_DTTM = S5.CAL_DATE AND S1.ITEM_ID = S2.ITEM_ID AND S1.ITEM_ID = S4.ITEM_CD AND S3.DC_ID = S1.LOC_ID AND S2.ITYPE IN ('FERT','HAWA') AND S3.DC_ID != '8922' AND DO_QTY, 0 DO_CHGO, 0 EX_QTY, 0 EX_CHGO, 0 GITA_QTY, 0 GITA_CHGO FROM ( SELECT S1.SALE_DATE, SUM(S1.QTY) QTY FROM SALES_ACT S1, ITEM_MST S2, ( SELECT CAL_DATE FROM CAL_MST WHERE CAL_DATE BETWEEN '$!{start_date}' AND '$!{end_date}' )S3 WHERE S1.DOMAIN = 'DO' AND S1.SALE_DATE = S3.CAL_DATE AND S1.ITEM_ID = S2.ITEM_ID AND S2.ITYPE = 'FERT' AND S2.DIVISION IN ('10','20') AND S1.DELIV_LOC != '8922' AND NVL(S2.CAT03,'XX') NOT LIKE 'O%' GROUP BY S1.SALE_DATE UNION ALL SELECT TO_DATE(YYYYMMDD,'YYYY-MM-DD'), SUM(S1.REQT_BOX) QTY FROM DWSDF210_DD S1, ITEM_MST S2 WHERE S1.YYYYMMDD = REPLACE('$!{end_date}', '-', '') AND S1.PROD_CODE = S2.ITEM_ID AND S1.SALE_GUBN = '1' AND S2.ITYPE = 'FERT' AND S2.DIVISION IN ('10','20') AND NVL(S2.CAT03,'XX') NOT LIKE 'O%' GROUP BY YYYYMMDD ) GROUP BY SALE_DATE UNION ALL SELECT SALE_DATE, '1' GUBN, 0 MS_QTY, 0 MS_CHGO, 0 DO_QTY, SUM(QTY) DO_CHGO, 0 EX_QTY, 0 EX_CHGO, 0 GITA_QTY, 0 GITA_CHGO FROM ( SELECT S1.SALE_DATE, SUM(S1.QTY) QTY FROM S2.ITEM_ID AND S2.ITYPE = 'HAWA' AND S2.RC_FLAG = 'Y' AND S1.DELIV_LOC != '8922' AND NVL(S2.CAT03,'XX') NOT LIKE 'O%' GROUP BY S1.SALE_DATE UNION ALL SELECT TO_DATE(YYYYMMDD,'YYYY-MM-DD'), SUM(S1.REQT_BOX) QTY FROM DWSDF210_DD S1, ITEM_MST S2 WHERE S1.YYYYMMDD = REPLACE('$!{end_date}', '-', '') AND S1.PROD_CODE = S2.ITEM_ID AND S1.SALE_GUBN = '1' AND S2.ITYPE = 'HAWA' AND S2.RC_FLAG = ADD_MONTHS('$!{start_date}',-12) AND ADD_MONTHS('$!{end_date}',-12) )S3 WHERE S1.DOMAIN = 'DO' AND S1.SALE_DATE = S3.CAL_DATE AND S1.ITEM_ID = S2.ITEM_ID AND S2.ITYPE IN ('FERT','HAWA') AND S1.DELIV_LOC != '8922' AND NVL(S2.CAT03,'XX') NOT LIKE 'O%' GROUP BY S1.SALE_DATE ) GROUP BY SALE_DATE ) GROUP BY IF_DTTM ORDER BY 1 #elseif("$!{selected_type}" == "PLT") SELECT "매입상품 금년출고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',DO_CHGO,0)),0) "매입상품 전년출고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',EX_QTY,0)),0) "수입상품 금년재고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',EX_QTY,0)),0) "수입상품 전년재고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',DO_CHGO,0)),0) - ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'1',EX_CHGO,0)),0) "기타 금년출고", ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',GITA_CHGO,0)),0) - ROUND(MAX(DECODE(GUBN,'2',MS_CHGO,0)),0) -
